title: Sensetive03
author: Sensetive03
created_time: August 01, 2022, 10:29:44 PMLast edit: August 02, 2022, 10:17:33 AM by Sensetive03
content: ------I'm putting the e-mail I sent to their support directly here. I beting here  tennis with very low odds and I win all the time. I lost $550 once. They excluded me for no reason even though there was a 10 percent cashback promotion for losses. ------                                                                                                  ↓                                                                                                  ↓                                                                                              - Mail -Hello there. First of all, I signed up for the duelbits family by reading the amazing reviews on bitcointalk.and I've been betting with you for about 15 days.you have this promotion.https://duelbits.com/promotions/tennis-10-cashback-offer-2My single tennis bet of $550 on July 30 lost. This is the bet number. 4738db27-3e88-4f53-93ff-e7f6220c2d20however, I was not given the money I was entitled to 10 percent cashback even though I fully complied with the terms and conditions of the promotion.After,I contacted customer service. After waiting for a while, he wrote me the following reply.( We have confirmation from the dedicated team that you are not eligible for this and any other promo on the site.Sorry but that's all the information that is available at the moment. ) WHEN I ASKED WHY I WAS EXCLUDED EVEN BY I DID FOLLOW THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS, I WAS TOLD YOU DON'T ASK THE SAME QUESTION, YOU WILL BE BLOCKED FROM LIVE SUPPORTWhy was I excluded from the public promotion on your homepage for no apparent reason ?Is it my fault that I got lucky and my bets won?Why don't you give me 10% cashback of my $550 lost tennis bet.The offer is valid for all users. how does this happen. You very clearly wrote back 10 percent for your losses and I lost.It is valid for every user who meets the promotional conditions. and I did all the conditions...this is scam behaivor.This issue should be resolved immediately. I am clearly and unequivocally right.WAİTİNG.........SCREENSHOTS -https://ibb.co/tDW9mXbhttps://ibb.co/92L7r9hhttps://ibb.co/p1bXPRHhttps://ibb.co/mzgwFt9https://ibb.co/fkYxDhHhttps://ibb.co/2YPjrj6https://ibb.co/DCMqPpqhttps://ibb.co/gT0WC0Vhttps://ibb.co/Y31N6tHhttps://ibb.co/SRgfJR3

comments.author: Sensetive03
comments.body: Hi guys, I found a little trick. especially duelbits users should read it. It's a completely real thing. I  shocked .

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Just because you did not get your cashback you are accusing Duelbits of stealing your money and that is only 10% cashback of your $550 bet which means you are asking for $55 cash back, I don't see the logic why would they stole $55 when they have thousands of dollars in their promotion  Quoteduelbits stole my money is not the right word, you should create a topic about your issue in a manner that you are asking to get addressed not accusing them, again for $55?! I don't see the logic or my math is not good.

comments.author: Sensetive03
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on August 02, 2022, 02:08:05 AMJust because you did not get your cashback you are accusing Duelbits of stealing your money and that is only 10% cashback of your $550 bet which means you are asking for $55 cash back, I don't see the logic why would they stole $55 when they have thousands of dollars in their promotion  Quoteduelbits stole my money is not the right word, you should create a topic about your issue in a manner that you are asking to get addressed not accusing them, again for $55?! I don't see the logic or my math is not good.If you can't give a reason for something, it's stealing. Everything is clear and clear.For God's sake, $55 is good money for people. This is indirect stealing. or clipping.Dear coin-investor , Sometimes I come across your posts. try to be with the customer. I guess there are casinos for which you are responsible.The 10 percent cashback promotion on their homepage is open to everyone. The conditions are very simple .. they say make a bet, if you lose we will give you 10 percent back.I think your math is good but your logic is not. You didn't understand a very simple thing.

comments.author: UserU
comments.body: There's a Scam Accusations board for that, you should post your thread or move it there.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=83.0Let the staff/ campaign manager see or be notified by other members so they get to find some resolution for your case.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Sensetive03 on August 02, 2022, 05:54:20 AMIf you can't give a reason for something, it's stealing. Everything is clear and clear.Why not miscommunication first before you take up the word stealing QuoteFor God's sake, $55 is good money for people. This is indirect stealing. or clipping.Yes It's good money but you are not accusing a robber or a notorious scammer QuoteDear coin-investor , Sometimes I come across your posts. try to be with the customer. I guess there are casinos for which you are responsible.I'm not part of any support of casinos here I'm just a member of this forum who gives input on the discussion QuoteThe 10 percent cashback promotion on their homepage is open to everyone. The conditions are very simple .. they say make a bet, if you lose we will give you 10 percent back.Believe me, I'm supporting you on this if you really deserve and I support winners that deserve their winnings and I'm against scammers QuoteI think your math is good but your logic is not. You didn't understand a very simple thing.I have a failing grade on Math but fair on logic, if you get robbed by a robber then it's stealing but if you've been shortchanged then take up your case and ask for an explanation, calling anyone a robber if it only communication is such a bad start

comments.author: Sensetive03
comments.body: they answered my mail.   this is part of answer;------------------In regards to the 10% weekly tennis cashback, "fortunately" you are not eligible for it. I mentioned fortunately because for you to be eligible for this promo you must have had losses on your tennis bets during the week, from Monday to Sunday, and that wasn´t the case. You won more than you lost. (You can check this info by accessing the "My bets" section and "My sports bets". --------------------------------------Duelbits have this terms ;How to take part:1.Place one or more live or pre-match single bets on any tennis game no later than the 12th September.2.We give you 10% cashback on your weekly net losses every Monday, up to $100Make sure your email address is verified or your Steam account is on Level 10+ to receive your promotional reward.But not clearly written in the terms and conditions... ( second term )never mind..  good luck guys ..

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: Sensetive03 on August 02, 2022, 10:43:23 AMthey answered my mail.   this is part of answer;------------------In regards to the 10% weekly tennis cashback, "fortunately" you are not eligible for it. I mentioned fortunately because for you to be eligible for this promo you must have had losses on your tennis bets during the week, from Monday to Sunday, and that wasn´t the case. You won more than you lost. (You can check this info by accessing the "My bets" section and "My sports bets". --------------------------------------Duelbits have this terms ;How to take part:1.Place one or more live or pre-match single bets on any tennis game no later than the 12th September.2.We give you 10% cashback on your weekly net losses every Monday, up to $100Make sure your email address is verified or your Steam account is on Level 10+ to receive your promotional reward.But not clearly written in the terms and conditions... ( second term )never mind..  good luck guys .."net loss" means that your total loss exceeds your total income(at least that is how I think what it means base on the definition I shared that can be seen on the link.), but since your winnings/profit exceed your loss you were not able to become eligible on their cashback.
